name: Robocraft
description: Build insane, fully customisable robot battle vehicles that drive, hover, walk and fly in the free-to-play action game Robocraft. Add weapons from the future and jump in the driving seat as you take your creation into battle against other players online!
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Dual Core or better with SSE2 support or equivalent AMD family Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Compatible GPU, DirectX 9.0c DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible Additional Notes: Min Resolution 1024x768
